name: Striped Red Shirt
description:
## Striped Red Shirt

Keep it simple and stylish with this classic and timeless striped red shirt that's perfect for any occasion.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
